title: Hamilton Beach 63325 Review with bread and cake
description: I created this video with the YouTube Video Editor (http://www.youtube.com/editor) as the title says it is a review of the Hamilton Beach 63325.  I have been using it to make bread several times a week and general purpose cakes and what not.

asset.author: blindpigfighter2
asset.hookText: I created this video with the YouTube Video Editor (http://www.youtube.com/editor) as the title says it is a review of the Hamilton Beach 63325.  I have been using it to make bread several times a week and general purpose cakes and what not.
